title: ThreeWill Provisioning Engine Template Extraction Configuration
description: Defines the configuration to use when extracting a template from a site

siteUrl.description: A value in the shape of https://[yourtenant].sharepoint.com/sites/yoursite

adminSiteUrl.description: A value in the shape of https://[yourtenant]-admin.sharepoint.com/sites/yoursite

permissions.description: Defines any custom permissions setup necessary for an entity

owners.description: Any default login names to be added to the site owners group

members.description: Any default login names to be added to the site members group

visitors.description: Any default login names to be added to the site visitors group

entityPlugin.description: Defines a plug-in to apply unique scripts for the specific entity type

preProvisioningTask.description: A path to a PowerShell script with pre-provisioning tasks

provisioningTemplate.description: A path to a SharePoint Provisioning template (.xml)

postProvisioningTask.description: A path to a PowerShell script with post-provisioning tasks

provisioningScript.description: A path to a PowerShell script to create the site and provide site provisioning

communicationSiteDefaultPath.description: The desired path for communication sites

teamSiteDefaultPath.description: The desired path for team sites

intranetSpokeSiteDefaultPath.description: The desired path for intranet spoke sites

skipExisting.description: Defines whether the script will skip existing sites or continue with provisioning

plugins.description: Plug-ins that allow for taking appropriate action for a given entity type

msTeamsProvisioning.description: Defines a plug-in to apply unique scripts for the MS Teams entity type

postProvisioningTask.description: A path to a PowerShell script with post-provisioning tasks

provisioningScript.description: A path to a PowerShell script to create the site and provide site provisioning

webparts.description: The details of the web parts to deploy as part of provisioning

pathToFolder.description: The path to the folder that holds the web part files to be deployed

files.description: An array of web parts to be deployed during provisioning

fileName.description: The name of the web part package to deploy

deployToTenant.description: Determines whether the web part should be deployed at the tenant scope rather than the site scope

environmentVariables.description: Other variables, specific to the environment that can be accessed by custom scripts
